QuestData.Title: Work Order: Golden Lotus I
QuestData.Description: <Yoon kept this order request short.>$b$bThe Golden Lotus have requested a large number of white turnips.$b$bTheir request mentioned something about trouble-making sprites wreaking havoc on Mistfall Village. Apparently the sprites don't like turnips!
QuestData.LogDescription: Plant 8 White Turnip Seeds on Sunsong Ranch.
